DataElement.preferredName: Central Pathology Review Prior Randomization Requirement Ind-2
DataElement.preferredDefinition: the yes/no indicator related to pre-randomization necessity for the process by which specimens are sent to a central lab for confirmatory analysis using standardized methods and result criteria in order to minimize inter-reviewer differences thereby improving the accuracy of pathology data.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Central Pathology Review Prior Randomization Requirement
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: information related to pre-randomization necessity for the process by which specimens are sent to a central lab for confirmatory analysis using standardized methods and result criteria in order to minimize inter-reviewer differences thereby improving the accuracy of pathology data.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: The process by which specimens are sent to a central lab for confirmatory analysis using standardized methods and result criteria in order to minimize inter-reviewer differences thereby improving the accuracy of pathology data.

Concepts.definition: The process by which specimens are sent to a central lab for confirmatory analysis using standardized methods and result criteria in order to minimize inter-reviewer differences thereby improving the accuracy of pathology data.

Property.preferredDefinition: Earlier in time or order.:The allocation of individuals to groups by chance, especially in order to control the variables in an experiment.:Required; necessary, not optional.

Concepts.definition: The allocation of individuals to groups by chance, especially in order to control the variables in an experiment.
Something that is a necessary condition; something that is obligatory.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: the management of a research protocol and its case report forms.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The preferred Value Domain to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Conceptual domain that includes value meanings to be used for Indicator Value Meanings such as Yes, No, Unknown, No Applicable

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A caDSR representation term that is used to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no

Concepts.definition: A response or indicator that can have a value of either yes or no.

ReferenceDocuments.name: A pre-randomization pathology
ReferenceDocuments.description: A pre-randomization pathology review is required.  The site has reviewed and understands the process listed in Section 17.0 and must account for sufficient time to complete pre-randomization and registration/randomization steps.

ReferenceDocuments.name: CRF Text
ReferenceDocuments.description: The site has reviewed and understands the process listed in Section 17.0 and must account for sufficient time to complete pre-registration and registration steps
